articles.title: 'Wuthering Heights' First Reactions Praise Margot Robbie, Jacob Elordi - Variety
articles.description: First reactions are calling 'Wuthering Heights' a 'bodice-ripping crowd-pleaser' that is 'destined to be a massive hit.'

articles.title: Kennedy Center workers still in the dark as orchestra scouts other venues - The Washington Post
articles.description: The center’s unions, leaders of the National Symphony Orchestra and lawmakers across the aisle reacted Tuesday to President Donald Trump’s planned closure of the center.

articles.title: New WWE NXT Champion Crowned - WrestleTalk
articles.description: The new WWE NXT Champion has now officially been crowned after Oba Femi vacated the championship back at New Year's Evil.

articles.title: Ricky Martin issues public statement to Bad Bunny after Grammys: 'I know how heavy it is' - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Ricky Martin has all the feels about Bad Bunny's historic night at the Grammy Awards on Sunday — and he's letting the world know in an open letter to his fellow Puerto Rican singer.

articles.title: ‘F1’ Sequel Teased By Racing Sport’s CEO At Apple TV Press Day - Deadline
articles.description: The biggest question heading into Apple TV press day was whether there would be a sequel to the biggest grossing sports movie of all-time and 4x Oscar nominee, F1. Taking a question from the audience, Apple’s SVP of Services, Eddie Cue, read it to Formula 1 C…

articles.title: Oregon theater marquee joked about 'Melania' movie, and manager says Amazon pulled the film - GeekWire
articles.description: The manager of the Lake Theater & Cafe in Lake Oswego, Ore., said it was "weird" that the film even exists and "funny" to screen it at the anti-establishment theater.

articles.title: ‘A**hole’ Comedian Booted Off Hit Podcast After 10 Minutes - The Daily Beast
articles.description: The “SmartLess” host couldn’t stand another minute of his behavior.

articles.title: Iconic Portland record store, oldest in the Northwest, is looking for a new owner - OregonLive.com

articles.title: ‘The Last of Us’ Casts Jorge Lendeborg Jr. to Replace Danny Ramirez as Manny; Clea DuVall Also Joins Season 3 - Variety
articles.description: 'The Last of Us' Season 3 has cast Jorge Lendeborg Jr. as Manny, replacing Danny Ramirez. Clea DuVall also joins the cast.

articles.title: The Iron Lung Box Office Controversy, Explained - SlashFilm
articles.description: A misunderstanding involving Markiplier's film Iron Lung and the reporting on its opening weekend at the box office has caused a bit of controversy.

articles.title: Lorde Posts 'Ice Out' and Donates $204,000 From Minneapolis Merch - Variety
articles.description: Lorde revealed that she donated all of her merch sales from her Minneapolis shows along with the message 'ICE out.'

articles.title: An Unrecognizable Jonah Hill Returns to the Big Screen for ‘Outcome,’ Alongside Keanu Reeves and Cameron Diaz - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Hill also co-wrote and directed the dark comedy, which premieres April 10 on Apple TV.

articles.title: A new generation revives 'The Muppet Show' and it's as delightful as ever - NPR
articles.description: This isn't the first reincarnation of Jim Henson's crew, but it's one of the best in a very long time. Seth Rogen is an executive producer, and Maya Rudolph and Sabrina Carpenter guest star.

articles.title: Roger Goodell expects a unifying performance from Bad Bunny. Conservatives aren't buying it. - Deseret News
articles.description: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell said the Super Bowl halftime show will be unifying. Many conservatives don't expect that to happen with Bad Bunny.

articles.title: Sinclair to Stream Kid Rock, Counter-Programing Its Own Affiliates Carrying Super Bowl - Consequence of Sound
articles.description: During the Super Bowl, Sinclair digital stations will stream Kid Rock's “All American Halftime Show," competing against its own affiliates for viewers.

articles.title: FX's 'Love Story': JFK Jr and Carolyn Bessette's Sex, Lies and Politics - Variety
articles.description: FX's 'Love Story' stars Paul Kelly and Sarah Pidgeon grace the cover of Variety and brings readers inside the romance of JFK JR and Carolyn Bessette.

articles.title: Sarah Ferguson emails to Epstein show increasing desperation - BBC
articles.description: The messages from the former Duchess of York appear to show her saying she feels "traumatised and alone".

articles.title: A Reminder That The ‘Fallout’ Finale Episode Release Time Has Changed - Forbes
articles.description: The finale episode of Fallout season 2 is upon us, but now Amazon has changed when it releases for some reason.
